server.ClientState

    server

    Test server controller implementation (external)

    • Uses of ClientState in server

      Classes in server that implement ClientState 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ServerThread
      Thread to handle individual requests from a client.
      Fields in server with type parameters of type ClientState 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,ClientState> Server.ids
      Hold onto references to all threads actively managed by server.
      Methods in server that return ClientState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ClientState Server.getState(java.lang.String id)
      Return the clientState associated with this ID.
      Methods in server with parameters of type ClientState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IShutdownHandler.logout(ClientState state)
      When client terminates connection, this method is invoked, but only if the ProtocolHandler also implements IShutdownHandler.
      Message IProtocolHandler.process(ClientState state, Message request)
      Process the protocol given a Message request received on behalf of the designated thread.
      static boolean Server.register(java.lang.String id, ClientState state)
      Register thread in server.
